column18: Weaving the Threads of the Future

column12: (Stat)* = Buffs on the troop card (e.g. "ATT+1 if troop is complete")

column17: +3 Drowned if this unit only has 1 Drowned at the beginning of its activation phase
This unit can ignore terrain effects
This unit ignores the effects of the Block and Mighty Throw talents
This unit never suffers more than 1 wound per attack / +1 Geri & Freki if this unit is not complete at the end of its activation phase
This unit inflicts an additional wound if it wounds a troop
This unit's attacks cannot be redirected if it moved this turn before making the attack
When this unit is destroyed, before removing it from the board, carry out a 0 range attack against the attacking unit
If complete, this unit may carry out an area attack instead of a normal attack
+1 Oathbreaker if this unit is not compelte at the end of its activation phase
When this unit is wounded or destroyed by an attack, you may draw a card from your deck
When retaliating, this unit gains the Mighty Throw talent
